rewrite1:
Revise the formatting of the fifth paragraph by setting the Outline Level to Level 2 and introducing a 0.5 line space above it. Center the text and indent the first line by 2 centimeters.

For the tenth paragraph, adjust the line spacing to double and insert a 6-point space before it. Switch the font to Microsoft YaHei and alter the text color to the hex code #FAFAD2.
